level.heading: ROLE OF THE OFFICE OF HUMAN RIGHTS (OHR) (§ 4-1202)

level.text: The Office of Human Rights (“OHR”) shall provide covered entities with oversight, central coordination, and technical assistance in their implementation of the provisions of the Act.

OHR shall ensure that the delivery of services by covered entities meets acceptable standards of translation and interpretation by providing information to the Office of Contracts and Procurement (OCP) to assist in the development of a quality procurement process.
OHR shall collect and publish statistical information regarding Language Access public complaints on an annual basis.
